subject: Re: Demo request for Acme Corp -- next steps
body:
Hi Jane Doe,

Thanks for reaching out!

I saw that you mentioned you're interested in scheduling a demo of your platform. I'd be happy to set up a personalized demo to show you how our platform can help Acme Corp.

Would any of the following times work for a 30-minute demo call this week?

Best,
Alex Rivera
Account Executive, OpenClaw
callToAction: Would any of the following times work for a 30-minute demo call this week?
